title: Diablo Snuff: A Foreign Evil
description: "Let me tell you about the night I experienced true evil. It started with a gaze. She was eye fucking the shit out of me."  Michael is at the tail end of his bachelor party vacation with his buddies and has had enough of all the gambling and flirtatious prostitutes. Then he meets Isabelle, a foreigner herself, and Michael is smitten. But even evil can come in a beautiful package.  BE ADVISED: THIS BOOK IS FOR A MATURE AUDIENCE AND CONTAINS GRAPHIC SEX AND VIOLENCE
author: C.C. Genovese
